description.value: While invisible, you can't be seen. You're @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Undetected]{Undetected} to everyone. Creatures can @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Seek]{Seek} to attempt to detect you; if a creature succeeds at its Perception check against your Stealth DC, you become @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} to that creature until you @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Sneak]{Sneak} to become undetected again. If you become invisible while someone can already see you, you start out hidden to the observer (instead of undetected) until you successfully sneak. You can't become @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Observed]{Observed} while invisible except via special abilities or magic.
